TopicTitle: TerraTech - physics based sandbox vehicle construction game

Articles.Content:
Hey,

anyone tried out TerraTech yet? I found it on reddit today and it's a pretty cool game about building vehicles and planes. It also has a multiplayer where you're able to test your creations against other players in combat or fight against an AI that controlls your own creations or those of your friends. I think this is pretty cool because you're able to improve your creations by letting them fight each other and let the winner fight against a newer creation in a gladiator like system

There is a free demo available on steam!

Here's a gameplay video:

They're currently trying to fund their project on kickstarter and they have only three days left, so give it a try, maybe you'll like it
